title: Part 1: Django Web Development
description: This part of the course equips you with the skills to build robust and scalable web applications using Django.

learning_outcomes.title: Web Development Fundamentals
learning_outcomes.content: Gain a solid understanding of the web development landscape, including HTTP requests and responses, web frameworks, and the Model-View-Template (MVT) architecture.

learning_outcomes.title: Building with Django
learning_outcomes.content: Dive deep into Django, a high-level Python web framework. Learn to create models, views, templates, and URLs to build dynamic web applications.

learning_outcomes.title: User Authentication and Authorization
learning_outcomes.content: Implement user authentication and authorization systems for secure access control in your Django applications. Explore features like login, registration, and user permissions.

learning_outcomes.title: Database Management with Django ORM
learning_outcomes.content: Master how to interact with databases using Django's Object-Relational Mapper (ORM). Perform CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on your data models efficiently.

learning_outcomes.title: Templating with Django Templates
learning_outcomes.content: Learn to create dynamic and visually appealing web pages using Django's templating engine. Explore template inheritance, context processors, and integrating static files.

learning_outcomes.title: Forms and Form Processing
learning_outcomes.content: Build user-friendly forms for data collection and validation within your Django applications. Handle form submissions and process user input effectively.

learning_outcomes.title: Deployment and Production
learning_outcomes.content: Understand the process of deploying your Django application to a web server for real-world usage. Explore configuration management tools and best practices for production environments.
